About Me

BIO

Hello! I'm Julius Gachuhi but my friends call me Kash.Full Stack Developer. I am passionate about programming and design.

My love for computers began at a very young age when my mother bought me my first computer. In 2013 I decided to do Computer Science so that I can gain enough knowledge in computer and software programming.

Since 2020 I have been working as a Software Developer for Smatons solutions and as a freelance front-end design and backe-end of client websites.

UI/UX Design

I have worked with Blender, Krita and Inkscape which are linux tools for design and have heavily researched effective UI/UX design. I desire to continue to grow my knowledge in this area.

Full Stack Web Development

Front End Development || Back End Development || Mobile Development

I am trained in Python, Django, Flask, Javascript, Jquery, Vue, Angular, CSS3, HTML5 stack, Postgresql. I have also explored Android Development, C and PHP/Wordpress development.

Front-End Designer

I specialize in front-end design and I love fine tuning a great layout. I have worked with Bootstrap and other front-end frameworks.

SEO & Marketing

I am regularly researching how to stay on top of fast-changing trends with search engines like Google and Duckduckgo.
